pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tri-Surface Mesh Plots for Brain Atlases // Mainly contains a plotting function ggseg3d(), and data of two standard brain atlases (Desikan-Killiany and aseg). By far, the largest bit of the package is the data for each of the atlases. The functions and data enable users to plot tri-surface mesh plots of brain atlases, and customise these by projecting colours onto the brain segments based on values in their own data sets. Functions are wrappers for 'plotly'. Mowinckel Vidal-Pieiro (2020) doi:10.1177/2515245920928009.
